trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Define atributos relacionados ao tamanho de uma imagem de bitmap em cache.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: Um bitmap é dimensionado com base nos valores definidos por essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> com propriedades de dimensionamento vazias.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> definida como `true`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> definido como zero e seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> definido como zero.

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: Quando passados para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, a entrada é o mesmo que a saída.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do bitmap resultante.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> que preserva a taxa de proporção do bitmap de origem e especifica um <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight" /> inicial.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> definida como `true`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> definido como o valor de `pixelHeight`e seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> definido como zero.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: The initial rotation value to apply.
trans-unit.target: O valor inicial de rotação a ser aplicado.

trans-unit.source: Only 90 degree increments are supported.
trans-unit.target: Há suporte apenas para incrementos de 90 graus.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" /> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> que preserva a taxa de proporção do bitmap de origem e especifica um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" /> inicial a ser aplicado.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: O bitmap resultante mantém sua taxa de proporção original e o dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriedade definida como o valor de `rotation`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> definida como `true`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> definido como 0 e seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> definido como 0.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do bitmap resultante.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> que preserva a taxa de proporção do bitmap de origem e especifica um <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth" /> inicial.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> definida como `true`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> definido como zero e sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> definido como o valor de `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelWidth" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <paramref name="pixelWidth" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do bitmap resultante.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do bitmap resultante.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> que não preserva a taxa de proporção original do bitmap.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: O bitmap resultante tem um tamanho eficaz de `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> definida como `false`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> definido como o valor de `pixelHeight`e sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> definido como o valor de `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, da imagem bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A altura do bitmap.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> deve ser maior que zero para ser válido.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, da imagem de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A largura do bitmap.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> deve ser maior que zero para ser válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que determina se a taxa de proporção da imagem de bitmap original é preservada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a taxa de proporção original é mantida; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Se a taxa de proporção original é preservada, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> representam os valores de tamanho máximo para o bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: O bitmap resultante é garantido apenas para ter sua largura ou sua altura correspondem aos valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: Se a taxa de proporção não é preservada, especificado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> forem usadas e o bitmap é esticado para usar esses valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o ângulo de rotação é aplicado a um bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo de rotação que é aplicado à imagem.

trans-unit.source: Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
trans-unit.target: Há suporte para apenas os incrementos de 90 graus.
